definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: spit (Eth. waraqa: id.; acc. to Lag:BN 200 II. [[ירק]] is not separate √; cf. [[יֵרָקׂן]], and Ar. yaraqa0nun robigo)—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. and Inf. abs. [[יׇרׂק]] [[יׇרַק בְּפָנֶיהָ]] Nu 12:14; 3 fs. consec. [[וְיׇרְֽקָה בְּפָנׇיו]] De 25:9; both, as token of contempt. Cf. [[רָקַק]], [[רׂק]].
